#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	//freopen("in","r",stdin);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		map < string , int  > foo ;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			string s;
			char c;
			cin>>s>>c;
			if(c=='+')
			foo[s]=1;
		else
			foo[s]=-1;
		}
		map < string , int > :: iterator it;
		int c=0; 
		for ( it = foo.begin () ; it != foo.end() ; it++ )
		{
          c += it ->second;
		}
		cout << c << endl;
	}
}
